sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> can't resist the <radical>call</radical> of a <kanji>bog</kanji>. Whenever a tsunami is headed toward land, a bog will always call out to it, "Hey tsunami, don't you want to hit me with your water? Come this way~"
meaningInfo: Close your eyes and hear the bog's tempting call.
readingMnemonic: As you listen to the <kanji>bog</kanji>'s call you realize it looks just like the <reading>Numa</reading> (<ja>ぬま</ja>) Numa guy in your mind. You open your eyes and it's just a bog. You close your eyes, and there he is. The Numa Numa guy.
readingInfo: So that's what happened to him! If you're a youngun, just do a little Google and you'll be pretty pleased, I'm sure.
